Package: prioritizr
  • Reference
  • Articles

Compile a problem

Compile a ConservationProblem into an OptimizationProblem.

compile(x, ...)

# S3 method for ConservationProblem
compile(x, ...)

Arguments

x
ConservationProblem object.
...
not used.

Value

OptimizationProblem object.

Examples

# build minimal conservation problem
p <- problem(sim_pu_raster, sim_features) +
  minimum_set_objective() +
  relative_targets(0.1)
#> Error in UseMethod("problem"): no applicable method for 'problem' applied to an object of class "c('RasterBrick', 'Raster', 'RasterStackBrick', 'BasicRaster')"

# compile the optimization problem
compile(p)
#> Error in compile(p): object 'p' not found
